title: ATP World Tour 500, Barcelona Men's Singles Results
text: April 26, 2018 / 5:52 PM / Updated 9 hours ago UPDATE 2-ATP World Tour 500, Barcelona Men's Singles Results Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Apr 27 (OPTA) - Results from the ATP World Tour 500, Barcelona Men's Singles matches on Thursday .. 3rd Round .. 1-Rafael Nadal (ESP) beat Guillermo Garcia-Lopez 6-1 6-3 (ESP) Martin Klizan (SVK) beat 12-Feliciano Lopez (ESP) 6-1 6-4 4-David Goffin (BEL) beat 16-Karen Khachanov (RUS) 2-6 7-6 6-0 8-Roberto Bautista Agut beat Pablo Andujar (ESP) 6-4 6-1 (ESP) Stefanos Tsitsipas (GRE) beat 10-Albert Ramos-Vinolas 6-4 7-5 (ESP) 3-Dominic Thiem (AUT) beat Jozef Kovalik (SVK) 7-6(5) 6-2 5-Pablo Carreno Busta beat 11-Adrian Mannarino (FRA) 6-2 4-6 7-6(6) (ESP) 2-Grigor Dimitrov (BUL) beat Malek Jaziri (TUN) 7-5 3-6 7-6(8)
